test_info.name: AQ-10 Children Version
test_info.full_name: Autism Spectrum Quotient - 10 Item Screening Tool

questions.text_pt: Ele/a nota muitas vezes pequenos ruídos que passam despercebidos às outras pessoas.
questions.text_en: He/she often notices small sounds that others do not.
questions.scoring_rule: Agreement (C or D) = 1 point, Disagreement (E or F) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Habitualmente, ele/a concentra-se mais na imagem ou situação no seu todo, do que nos pequenos detalhes.
questions.text_en: Usually, he/she concentrates more on the whole picture or situation rather than the small details.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Quando está num grupo social, ele/a consegue facilmente seguir conversas de várias pessoas diferentes.
questions.text_en: When in a social group, he/she can easily follow conversations between different people.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Ele/a consegue facilmente fazer mais do que uma coisa ao mesmo tempo.
questions.text_en: He/she can easily do more than one thing at the same time.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Ele/a não sabe como manter uma conversa com os seus pares.
questions.text_en: He/she doesn't know how to keep a conversation going with peers.
questions.scoring_rule: Agreement (C or D) = 1 point, Disagreement (E or F) = 0 points

questions.text_en: Socially, he/she is a good conversationalist.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Durante a leitura de uma história, ele/a tem dificuldades em perceber as intenções das personagens.
questions.text_en: When reading a story, he/she has difficulty understanding the characters' intentions.
questions.scoring_rule: Agreement (C or D) = 1 point, Disagreement (E or F) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: No pré-escolar, ele/a gostava de brincar a jogos de faz-de-conta com as outras crianças.
questions.text_en: In preschool, he/she enjoyed playing pretend games with other children.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Ele/a percebe facilmente o que alguém está a pensar ou a sentir, apenas olhando para o rosto dessa pessoa.
questions.text_en: He/she easily perceives what someone is thinking or feeling just by looking at that person's face.
questions.scoring_rule: Disagreement (E or F) = 1 point, Agreement (C or D) = 0 points

questions.text_pt: Ele/a tem dificuldades em fazer novos amigos
questions.text_en: He/she has difficulty making new friends
questions.scoring_rule: Agreement (C or D) = 1 point, Disagreement (E or F) = 0 points

interpretation.above_cutoff: Suggests potential autism spectrum traits - further comprehensive assessment recommended
interpretation.below_cutoff: Below clinical cutoff - score within typical range

pt: 2. Preencha a escola, marcando um X na resposta do paciente
3. Ao finalizar a aplica, a planilha do Exel ira realizas os cálculos automaticamente
en: 2. Fill in the choice, marking an X in the patient's response
3. Upon finishing application, the Excel spreadsheet will perform calculations automatically

scoring_instructions.pt: Cote 1 ponto por cada resposta 'Concordo totalmente' ou 'Concordo em parte' dada nas questões: 1, 5, 7 e 10 e 1 ponto por cada resposta 'Discordo em parte' ou 'Discordo totalmente' dada nas questões: 2, 3, 4, 6, 8 e 9.
scoring_instructions.en: Score 1 point for each 'Strongly agree' or 'Somewhat agree' response given in questions: 1, 5, 7, and 10, and 1 point for each 'Somewhat disagree' or 'Strongly disagree' response given in questions: 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, and 9.
